definition: see 李鐵拐|李铁拐[Li3 Tie3 guai3]
iron (metal)/arms/weapons/hard/strong/violent/unshakeable/determined/close/tight (slang)
surname Tie
to turn (a corner etc)/to kidnap/to swindle/to misappropriate/walking stick/crutch/seven (used as a substitute for 七[qi1])
plum
surname Li

sentences.english: How did Tieguai Li always lose things?
sentences.chinese: 这铁拐李怎么老丢东西？

another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
Daoist priest
